alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:03PM EDT until July 13 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutland County in southern Vermont... Southern Windsor County in southern Vermont... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 803 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cavendish, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Woodstock, Chester, White River Junction, Hartland Four Corners, Cavendish, Ludlow Village, Perkinsville Village, Mt. Holly, Plymouth, Hartland, Windsor, Woodstock Village, Mount Holly, Ludlow, Andover, Weston, Ascutney, Reading, Baltimore, and Springfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
